Site availability checker

Checks whether a website is online or not.

Return to homepage Send abuse on Twitter

What does this plugin do?

The site availability plugin uses the fantastic Down for everyone or just me? website to check whether a given website is online or not and sends you the result.

How does it look?

Configuration details

URL: https://hooks.sscaas.eu/uptime/?callback=<your webhook URL>
Method: GET

Output details

Slackbot will inform you of the site's status.

Slack Slash Commands as a Service is maintained by danielsamuels . This page was generated by GitHub Pages using the Cayman theme by Jason Long .
